page.title: 10HOME LIFE
page.content: In Skelton and district there is little evidence of poverty. Our survey shows that many homes possess luxuries, 10% have microwave cookers, 10% have computers, 40% have more than one car, almost all have washing machines, some have dish washers, 20% have video cassette recorders, 60% have hi-fi's, 80% have more than one television, some families have a caravan and almost one half have an organ or piano. The vast majority of families have pets usually dogs and cats. Some 60% go away for their holidays, 20% go abroad. 80% of people attend church occasionally, 10% go every week, 10% do not go at all.
